remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service determines which Avatar System Code it will use by reading the contents of
the TingenWebService/AppData/Runtime/systemcode.tngn file.
You heard that right! The systemcode.tngn file is located in the TingenWebService/AppData/Runtime/ folder!
When the Tingen Web Service (and Outpost31) are built, everything should end up where it's supposed to end up. But if you are
developing Tingen/Outpost31, you should know that the system.code file is part of the Tingen Web Service project, not the
Outpost31 project.

The systemcode.tngn file should contain a single line of text with one of the following values:
LIVE
UAT
